backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing gift pages with create, query, list, and delete operations using a Map keyed by generated IDs.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping high-level features to related frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for the creator page and gift unlock flow inside the app layout.
frontend/src/components/gift-creator/Gif: Main multi‑step gift creation wizard managing form state, step rendering, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/gift-creator/Hid: Editor for adding, updating, and removing hidden surprise messages.
frontend/src/components/gift-creator/Qui: Editor for managing quiz questions and answers with add, edit, and remove actions.
frontend/src/components/gift-creator/ste: Collects basic gift info including names, email, and a date-password with validation.
Handles uploading, processing, previewing, annotating, and removing banner and gallery photos.
Provides tabbed editors for love message, ending message, quiz items, and hidden messages.
Shows a live preview of the final gift using all filled form sections and uploaded media.
Creates the gift via API and displays a shareable link with copy and preview options.
frontend/src/components/gift/EndingScree: Displays the final message with a fade‑in animation inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/gift/FloatingHea: Renders animated floating heart icons unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/gift/GiftPage.ts: Builds the full gift page by decoding data, reconstructing images, and rendering all gift sections.
Shows the banner image with animated 'For' and 'From' overlay text and a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/gift/HiddenMessa: A component that reveals or hides surprise messages when clicking gift cards using a toggleable set of revealed indices.
Displays a love letter with a typewriter-style text reveal effect inside a styled card.
Renders a quiz with questions and toggleable answers, allowing users to reveal or hide each answer individually.
frontend/src/components/gift/PasswordGat: Provides a password entry form that validates an 8‑digit date and triggers an unlock callback on success.
frontend/src/components/gift/PhotoFlipGa: Shows a grid of photos that flip to reveal notes on click using tracked flipped indices.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with background styling, gradient overlay, content wrapper, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentMeta.ts: Hook for setting the document title and meta description when components mount or update.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing identities with login and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and creating gift pages, including data encoding and media processing before submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom romantic theme colors, fonts, and animations including float, fade, and 3D flip card utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/GiftCreatorPage.tsx: Renders the multi‑step gift creator wizard with page metadata and romantic header styling.
frontend/src/pages/GiftUnlockPage.tsx: Handles password‑gated gift access, loading states, error states, and renders the unlocked GiftPage with decoded data.
frontend/src/types/gift.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for gift form data, photos with notes, and quiz items.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a function to copy text to the clipboard with a secure-context check and fallback method.
frontend/src/utils/giftDataEncoder.ts: Implements JSON-based encoding and decoding of gift data for storage and retrieval.
frontend/src/utils/imageProcessing.ts: Resizes and compresses uploaded images using a canvas and returns a processed File object.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains date and email validation helpers using simple regex and range checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and support for okLCH theme variables.
project_state.json: Describes overall project requirements, existing features, architecture notes, and image asset needs.
